com.huge.drawingtool

Class DrawingTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.huge.drawingtool.DrawingTool

  • public class DrawingTool
extends java.lang.Object
    The DrawingTool class provides operations to charge a new graphic, draw shapes and print the graphic.
    Author:
    sebas.monsalve@gmailcom

    • Method Detail

      • newGraphic

        public void newGraphic(java.lang.String filePath)
                throws java.io.IOException,
                       ExceptionAccessFile,
                       ExceptionFormatFile,
                       ExceptionShape,
                       ExceptionPaint
        Validates and draws the different shapes inside the file
        Parameters:
        filePath - - path of the file with the instructions to draw
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a problem reading the file
        ExceptionAccessFile - if there is a problem accessing to the file
        ExceptionFormatFile - if there is a problem with the format of each instruction
        ExceptionShape - if there is a problem drawing the shape
        ExceptionPaint - if there is a problem painting the graphic

      • canDrawShape

        public void canDrawShape(java.lang.String[] draw,
                         int numParm,
                         int limit,
                         java.lang.String format)
                  throws ExceptionFormatFile
        Validate if the instruction to draw has the correct format
        Parameters:
        draw - array with the instruction to draw
        numParm - number of parameters of the instruction
        limit - limited position of parameters
        format - format of the instruction
        Throws:
        ExceptionFormatFile - if there is a problem with the format of the shape's parameters

      • saveGraphic

        public void saveGraphic()
                 throws ExceptionAccessFile,
                        java.io.IOException
        Save the results of the graphic in a file
        Throws:
        ExceptionAccessFile - if there is a problem saving the graphic in a file
        java.io.IOException - if there is a problem accessing to the file

      • isNaturalNumber

        public boolean isNaturalNumber(java.lang.String number)
        Validate if a number belongs a the set of natural numbers
        Parameters:
        number - value to validate
        Returns:
        true is the number is natural
